Krenaht:
So you'd like to know how talismans are made.
If you want to make a Giant Pursuers Talisman, you'll need to collect the core materials. It'll also cost you.
The core ingredients are the Giant Crystal and the Giant's Energy. The Giant Crystal is contained in the supply box that we have given you in exchange for your hep with our missions.
Also, the performance of the talismans can be improved, but that will require additional materials. Be sure to check beforehand.
If you want to make a talisman, prepare the materials necessary. Also be prepared to pay the cost.
